1.12.0.3.0:
Update to Minecraft 1.12
Fix a rather serious bug in the block replace code
Add a command to run commands from files
Add block replace sub-commands to add removed blocks (all or from a mod) to the list
1.12.0.3.1: Update to new Forge registry things in Forge 2348+

1.11.2.0.2.1:
Fix modifier keys getting stuck if opening a GUI while sneaking
 Fix a missed empty ItemStack change
 Only register the input/GUI event handlers if the wand is enabled
1.11.2.0.3.0:
Fix a rather serious bug in the block replace code
Add a command to run commands from files
Add block replace sub-commands to add removed blocks (all or from a mod) to the list

1.10.2.0.3.0:
Fix a rather serious bug in the block replace code
Some Chunk Wand HUD improvements
Fix modifier keys getting stuck
Add a command to run commands from files
Add block replace sub-commands to add removed blocks (all or from a mod) to the list
1.10.2.0.2.1: Fix not checking for valid dimension when getting the save directory
1.10.2.0.2.0:
Added blockreplace commands
Added entity and tileentity remove and rename commands
Added a block registry dump command
Added block registry clean-up command
Added a task scheduler, all commands now use it instead of running in one go
Added a 'Set biome' mode to the Chunk Wand
1.10.2.0.1.0-alpha.3: Fix the tileticks command failing due to a Forge bug. Fix forgotten mod renaming related localization issues in the Chunk Wand.
1.10.2.0.1.0-alpha.2:
Add 'tileticks find-invalid' and 'tileticks remove-invalid' commands.
Fix getting a wrong region in certain situations.
